about_the_game:
Embark on an epic saga in Asgard's Fall, a norse Survivors-like Roguelite. Fight your way through hordes of creatures and let the gods feel your relentless wrath. How will your saga unfold?

The demo of Asgard's Fall — Viking Survivors includes

  • A fateful decision: Choose between two playable characters; the Warrior and the Huntress

  • The journey to the Nine Realms: Explore the realms of Midgard and Muspelheim

  • A vide variety of Abilities: Unlock and master a total of 30 unique abillities

  • The Secret of Mixed Abilities: Reveal the synergetic effect of 5 Mixed Abilities

  • Behold the Web of Wyrd: Weave a total of 20 knots into your Web to enhance your power and shape your fate

  • The Remnants of War: Unlock more than 28 warpaint runes, and place them into an inventory management system with savvy to further strengthen your character.

  • The difficulty of Sacrifice: Use the altar of Blood Sacrifice to further modify your run by cranking up the difficulty.

You can choose from a variety of heroes to demonstrate your might in the battle against Asgard, such as the fierce Warrior and the agile Huntress, each with their own distinct skill tree. Do you have the courage to face the hordes and leaders of the Nine Realms?

Master the art of combat with the dynamic Ability System. Choose from a diverse array of skills, each tailored to your playstyle. Unleash devastating attacks, strategic buffs, and unique powers to conquer the Nine Realms. Forge your hero's destiny!

Behold the Web of Wyrd, where the threads of destiny are woven by your own hand. Forge your fate by placing powerful knots into the Web of Wyrd, further enhancing your strength on your path to conquering Asgard.

A meta-progression system where you unlock Warpaint runes that modify and amplify your characters' abilities. It features an inventory management system, challenging you to fit as many effective runes as possible into a limited space, maximizing their impact on your abilities, playstyle, and strategy.

Warpaint runes can be found during battle or crafted using pigments looted from enemies or discovered in Yggdrasil's Gift caches.  

Shape your hero's evolution with our intricate Skill Tree. Customize your playstyle by unlocking diverse abilities, enhancing strengths, and adapting to challenges. Every choice influences your saga's outcome. Craft a hero uniquely suited to your journey through the Nine Realms!
